com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.internal.reportpojo

Class FlagPoJo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.internal.reportpojo.FlagPoJo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlagWithDescriptionPoJo, TermCandidate

    public class FlagPoJo
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The FlagPoJo is used by report parsing. It is converted to a Flag by ReportProxy and FlagConverter.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • mergeClassifiedSuggestionsIntoNormalTextOnlySuggestions

        public void mergeClassifiedSuggestionsIntoNormalTextOnlySuggestions()
        Merge classified suggestions into normal text only suggestions. If your client works on a textual base during replacement you may want to merge the classified suggestions into the old-fashioned suggestions.

        Notes:

        • Do not call this method if your client wants to handle classified suggestions separated later on.
        • Calling this method more than once won't have any effect because only suggestions which are not already included in the suggestions list are merged.
